availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John J. Bromback (Boone County, Kentucky, carpenter)

body.p: Boone County, Kentucky, farm manager. Kentucky native. Son of George W. Bromback and Elizabeth Bromback. Married to Martha Green Bromback in Boone County, Kentucky, on November 11, 1855. Father of Frances E. Bromback and James A. Bromback. Resident of Boone County in 1850. Farm manager in Verona in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boone County, District 2, p. 187B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boone County, Verona, p. 224.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Pendleton County Marriages, Film #000216817.
